code: import React from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import logo from"../assets/logo.png";import"../styles/navbar.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{className:"navbar-wrapper",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"navbar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-left",onClick:()=>navigate("/"),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo,alt:"BlueSheep Logo",className:"nav-logo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"nav-title",children:"BlueSheep University"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{className:"nav-dropdown",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{children:"Browse"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{children:"Courses"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{children:"Programs"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{children:"Resources"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-search",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Search Courses..."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fa fa-search"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-right",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"welcome-text",children:"Welcome, Student \uD83C\uDF93"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"notification-dot"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"profile-circle",title:"My Profile"})]})]})});};export default Navbar;
